name: 吳景傑
objective:
「民主」與「法治」雖然已是臺灣民眾琅琅上口的重要「價值」，但其具體實踐絕非毫無問題。本課程預計先介紹「法律」、「正義」與「國家」等重要概念，並說明臺灣法律之發展歷程與現況；此外亦嘗試透過臺灣社會近年五則重大法律爭議課題，探討法律與生活之關係，以及部分法律運作時遭逢的挑戰。本課程希望藉由上述設計，令修課學生對「法律」等相關概念具備更深刻的理解。
Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.
